title: Minecraft Wii U版现已开放购买
author: minehenry
txt_content:
Hello!
你们好！
It seems like just a few weeks ago that I was writing about Nintendo. Now the day has finally come! Minecraft: Wii U Edition is rolling out to eStores worldwide.
距离我上次说到任天堂的事只过了几天，现在这一天终于到来了！Minecraft: Wii U版已延伸到世界各个应用商店中。
Minecraft: Wii U Edition costs $29.99 or equivalent and comes bundled with six of our most popular add-on packs, giving you the chance to tweak the styling of your in-game character and world. The Battle & Beasts Skin Pack, Battle & Beasts 2 Skin Pack, Natural Texture Pack, City Texture Pack, Fantasy Texture Pack, and Festive Mash-up Pack are all included.
Minecraft: Wii U版需要29.99美元，六个最火的游戏附加包可以改变你在游戏中的材质。Battle & Beasts皮肤包、Battle & Beasts 2皮肤包、Natural材质包、City 材质包、Fantasy材质包和Festive Mash-up材质包都被添加了。

Just like all editions of Minecraft, Wii U Edition will be updated over time with fixes and features. Today, Minecraft: Wii U Edition stands at version 1.6.4 (if you compare it to our other console releases), but we’re working hard to get it synced up with the most recent updates.
像其他所有的Minecraft平台一样，Wii U版将会不断修复漏洞并更新。今天，Minecraft: Wii U版停留在1.6.4中，但是我们正在努力让它更新到最新版本。
Wii U Edition also supports off-screen play, so you can play on the GamePad if your TV explodes, the remote goes missing, or if someone else insists on showing one of those fireplace videos to create some festive ambiance.
Wii U版还支持关屏游戏，所以如果你的电视瞬间爆炸了你还可以用手柄玩，一些人甚至可以用Fireplace Videos去创造节日的气氛。
Download and have fun, Nintendo fans. We’re extremely thankful to launch our game on another awesome platform, and delighted to introduce a new chunk of players to the world of Minecraft!
下载后尽情地玩吧，任天堂的粉丝们。我们很感谢我们能够在一个很优秀的平台上推出我们的游戏并让许多世界各地的玩家接触到Minecraft
Happy holidays everyone!
祝各位节日快乐！
